00011 class Fault{
00012     public:
00013     Wire *FaultSite;
00014     bool faultType;     // s-a-0 or s-a-1
00015     bool detected;
00016 
00017     //Constructor
00018     Fault(Wire *faultwire,int type)
00019     {
00020         if ((type != 0) && (type != 1))
00021         {
00022             cout << "Unknown fault type" << endl;
00023             assert(false);
00024         }
00025         FaultSite = faultwire;
00026         faultType = type;
00027         detected=false;
00028     }
00029 
00030 };
